JobFullDesc: At Bristol Myers Squibb, we are inspired by a single vision – transforming patients’ lives through science. In oncology, hematology, immunology and cardiovascular disease – and one of the most diverse and promising pipelines in the industry – each of our passionate colleagues contribute to innovations that drive meaningful change. Join us and make a difference.The Senior Specialist, External Manufacturing Sourcing employs advanced analytics to provide centralized support for category strategy development and execution (eg. demand-side and supply-side strategies). The incumbent supports the Supplier Relationship Management processes and procedures, the supplier and category segmentation process, and for key categories, the monitoring of relevant metrics and KPI scorecards.The Senior Specialist supports analysis of Total Cost of Ownership, buying decision data, SKU rationalization, and opportunity assessment.
